title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: No default value is set after modifying the default value.
EB: The default value should remain as 'aaa' after modifying it.
SR:
1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK. 
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly. 
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. 
5. The default value should still be 'aaa' and the OK button should be grayed out.
